statements: UPDATE customer_engagement_metrics SET clicks = 50, impressions = 100 WHERE customer_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_engagement_metrics SET conversions = 10, clicks = 75 WHERE campaign_id = 202 AND customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_engagement_metrics SET clicks = clicks + 5, conversions = 10 WHERE customer_id = 100 AND campaign_id = 200
UPDATE customer_engagement_metrics SET impressions = impressions * 1.5 WHERE customer_id = 300 AND campaign_id = 400
UPDATE customers SET engagement_score = 80 WHERE customer_id = '37e1a36b-17e5-4fd9-bd68-7ec91b3d799f';
UPDATE campaigns SET total_engagement = 1500, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = '7418e805-0ac3-4991-bf5c-b81d6dbf17c5';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', engagement_score = 75 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE campaigns SET total_engagement = 500, start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale'
UPDATE customers SET engagement_score = 85 WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE campaigns SET budget = 15000.50, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 98765;
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE campaign_engagement SET interaction_type='clicked' WHERE engagement_id=10;

UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE campaigns SET end_date = '2023-10-15', campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE engagements SET engagement_type='Email' WHERE customer_id=2 AND campaign_id=3;

UPDATE purchases SET purchase_amount = 1500.50, purchase_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE purchase_id = 456;
